clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Preoperative Nutritional Assessment and Nutritional Support on Clinical Outcomes
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Preoperative Nutritional Assessment and Nutritional Support on Clinical Outcomes in Elective Abdominal Surgery Patients: A Prospective Observational Study

collaborator.agency: First Affiliated Hospital, Sun Yat-Sen University
Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University
The Second Affiliated Hospital of Harbin Medical University
The First Affiliated Hospital of Kunming Medical College

brief_summary.textblock: It is a study to evaluate the relationship between preoperative nutritional assessment and clinical outcomes and to explore the effect of preoperative nutritional support on clinical outcomes in patients after abdominal operation.

detailed_description.textblock: It is a multi-center prospective observational cohort study to evaluate the relationship between preoperative nutritional assessment and clinical outcomes and to explore the effect of preoperative nutritional support on clinical outcomes in patients after abdominal operation. The nutrition risk were evaluated by different methods. The nutrition support regimens and the clinical outcomes were recorded.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patients enrollment until the date of infection documented from any cause, assessed up to 2 months.
primary_outcome.description: Invasion of the host organism by microorganisms that can cause pathological conditions or diseases.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patients enrollment until the date of patients discharge from hospital, assessed up to 2 months.
From date of patients enrollment until the date of patients discharged from hospital, assessed up to 12 months.
secondary_outcome.description: The length of patients stay in hospital.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patients enrollment until the date of patients are subjected to operation, assessed up to 2 months.
secondary_outcome.description: The total energy patients received during the study

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of patients enrollment until the date of death from any cause, assessed up to 2 months after patients discharged from hospital.
secondary_outcome.description: All deaths reported in all enrolled patients.

biospec_descr.textblock: The serum were collected to assess the nutrition risk.

study_pop.textblock: Patients undergoing selective operation without trauma.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Informed consent of patients or their legal representatives to participate in this study.
2. patients undergoing selective operation without trauma
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Age: <18 years old or >80 years old
2. Discharge within 24 hours
3. Accept surgery at 8:00 next day
4. Withdraw of patient's informed consent
